This is question is a honest one, so I'm going to give you some that clue other people night not want to share with you buddy. First of all, in everything you do in crypto space, make sure you have access to your private keys and they are not manage in any custodial platforms. Here are the list of my advices:Make sure you you do your own personal researches and findings before you waste money on any thing, whether it's a coin or tokens, hardware or software wallets or the type of the exchange you want to use to buy and sell your coins.Don't buy shitcoins and meme coins, these coins trend and are very profitable for many people but you have to be careful about them because their downfall are very bad, they can make you hate crypto forever.Don't leave your coins on any centralized exchanges, use it if you want to but make sure that you don't leave your coins on the exchange to avoid stories and regret.Lastly, don't forget that nothing is guaranteed with crypto, anything can happen.These are my advices, in addition; you have to develop strong mind to hold any coin that you hold because the growth is not linear, it will go up one time and will comes down another time.

Don't believe anything someone tells you in this space unless you've done extensive research and confirmed it's true.Don't leave your coins on centralised exchanges; instead, act as your own bank and keep your funds in a decentralised wallet. Keep your private keys safe and do not share them with others because they are the password to access your money.If you ever want to invest in a coin other than bitcoin, do your own research and calculate the risk you're willing to take. Don't let your altcoin investments turn you off to cryptocurrency in general. You are always welcome to stay and invest in bitcoin.Continue to learn and grow in this space; continuous learning will provide you with an understanding of new technology in the space and will assist you in becoming more knowledgeable and confident in the cryptocurrency space.

comments.author: Barikui1
comments.body: At some point in life, their was a Time we were all novice, so for now we just have to share some knowledge to newbie's, because we were once like that.* When venturing into the crypto industry, we should have it at the back of our minds that it's not a get rich quick scheme.* Do your own research, as simple as it sounds, brother you will get more than the information you ask for if you do your own research.* Go for Bitcoin, they are the real deal, try as much as possible to avoid alt coin.* Know that the crypto industry is filled with risk, so invest what you can afford to lose, so that your emotions can be in check.* Learn to be patience, it's near impossible to succeed in cryptocurrency without it.* Avoid storing your asset in a centralized exchange to avoid stories that tourch.
